mapper.select: select cwt.crew_id as crewId, ct.crew_name as crewName, ct.crew_profile_img as crewProfileImg, case when cmt.crew_member_id is null then '대기중' else '승인 완료' end as status from crew_welcome_tb cwt join crew_tb ct on (cwt.crew_id = ct.crew_id) left outer join crew_member_tb cmt on (cwt.crew_id = cmt.crew_id and cwt.user_id = cmt.user_id) where cwt.user_id = #{userId}
select reason, created_at from report_tb where reported_id = #{userId} order by created_at desc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tb (oauth_type, provider_id, email, profile_img, full_name, nickname, phone_number, gungu_id, address, birth_date, gender, user_total_km ) VALUES (#{oauthType}, #{providerId}, #{email}, #{profileImg}, #{fullName}, #{nickname}, #{phoneNumber}, #{gunguId}, #{address}, #{birthDate}, #{gender}, #{userTotalKM} )
